product_overview: DeckSure resurfaces worn timber, filling cracks and sealing decks against weather and wear.
key_features: 🌍 Multi-Surface Application: Works across Rough timber

recommended_use.intro: Perfect for interior and exterior applications, including:
items: Suitable for decks, ramps, and walkways

application_system.label: Topcoat
application_system.purpose: Builds final protective layer for durability.

thinner: Thinner: Clean potable water (max 10% dilution if required)
application: Use pad, roller or brush. Best applied in 2 coats.
storage_safety: Use PPE (gloves, mask, goggles) during application.
Keep out of reach of children.
Avoid inhalation of mist; ventilate during use.
In case of eye contact, rinse immediately with clean water.
